name: Mom Runner
description:
Mom Runner is a runner game, a maternity simulator. 

You are a mother who needs to let your baby sleep, no matter what. 

There are many dangers that the street offers, but nothing is as spooky as waking up your baby in the middle of their nap. 

Now, you have one job: take your baby home before he wakes up without any harm happening to you both. After all, if your baby wakes up, nobody knows what may happen. 

Credits:

Game Designer: Rafaella Moraes Project Manager: Ana Antar Coding: Pedro Castro Menezes, Romulo Ladeira Music: Uppbeat - Kevin Macleod - Itty Bitty 8 bit Sound Effects: Sonniss GDC Audio Bundle Art: RPG Urban Pack by Kenney, Canva Edited.
